caption:
The photograph shows a scene with an architectural and human element. A woman is walking towards a large, modernist building with a distinct urban feel. The building is constructed with a dark brick façade, featuring tall, narrow windows set between vertical concrete pillars. These windows are reflective, mirroring some trees and open sky.

The woman is captured from behind, walking up a series of wide shallow steps towards the entrance of the building, suggesting that she may be heading to work or an appointment there. She is dressed in a professional manner, wearing a dark skirt and a light-colored blouse under a dark vest, paired with dark shoes. She also carries a dark handbag.

In the background, aside from the building, there is a hint of greenery and another part of what looks like a parked bicycle to one side, hinting at this being a public or semi-public space, possibly an educational or corporate campus. The setting is bathed in sunlight, indicating that the photo was taken on a clear day. The overall atmosphere is quiet and orderly.
title: Cleo Rogers Memorial Library
